item.title: 数据分析包
item.description: numpy ###切片索引 1 2 3 4 a = np.array([[1,2,3], [4,5,6]]) b= np.random.random((2,2)) # astype做类型转换 a.astype(np.float) 数组索引与切片/Array indexing and slicing a[:, 1:3] array([[[4, 5, 6]], [[2, 4, 5]]]) a > 2 array([[[False, False, True], [ True, True, True]], [[False, False, True], [False, True,
